## {{< fa book >}} Suggested readings

If you are interested to learn more about the concepts behind this course:

- read [Good enough practices in scientific computing](https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005510).
- read [Excuse Me, Do You Have a Moment to Talk About Version Control?](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/00031305.2017.1399928).
